nodes.text: Slightly Off Track is a small company that was responsible for the audio track reading in the post-production of the Star Wars: Clone Wars televison series. Slightly Off Track also did audio work for Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends, Dexter's Laboratory, Grim & Evil, and Nickelodeon's Random! Cartoons, Chowder, and in fact, any of a number of animated productions, a more complete list of which is available at IMDb.
